name: Cosmos Pay
author: BitCanna

sections.description:
The Cosmos Pay plugin allows you to accept cryptocurrency payments on your WordPress site. You can enable multiple currencies from the interconnected Cosmos ecosystem with just a few clicks. The plugin works with the Keplr Wallet Browser Extension, and any other wallet that supports the integrated cryptocurrencies.

An up-to-date list of current supported cryptocurrencies can be found on our documentation website.
sections.installation: For instructions to install/configure the plugin and performing payments, please head over to our documentation website.
sections.faq: For our FAQ we’d like to refer you to our documentation website.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: This version fixes a bug. Upgrade immediately.

screenshots.caption: On this page you can add your cryptocurrency addresses to receive payments.
In the woocommerce settings of your store you can edit the description of the payment method and select the currencies you would like to accept.
Customers can select their desired cryptocurrency and their preferred way to pay.
Simply approve the Keplr Browser Extension pop-up and perform the payment.
After just a couple seconds, the payment will be performed and you can view your transaction.
